*******************************************************************
Data arrangement:
1st line: yr_start, yr_end, yr_cyc1, yr_cyc2, base_value (4i5,f8.2):
  yr_start, yr_end : starting and ending year of the table
  yr_cyc1, yr_cyc2 : marks for 1st and last cycles used for data beyond table range
  base_value       : base value to be added
2nd line and so on: year, solcon in w/m2 (i4,f10.4)
 
 NRLTSI2 obtained from http://lasp.colorado.edu/home/sorce/data/tsi-data/
; TSI Reconstruction based on NRLTSI2 (Coddington et al., BAMS, 2015 doi: 10.1175/BAMS-D-14-00265.1)
; Scaled by 0.999999 (-0.0016 W/m^2) to match SORCE/TIM absolute value
;    from Kopp & Lean (GRL, 2011)
; Extended using SORCE/TIM annual averages from 2003 onward
; Computed by Greg Kopp using TIM V.17 on Thu Jan 19 16:17:58 2017 ;
; Year   TSI [W/m^2]
